10.28.19  11:42 am   how did you do the thing in "hello sexy pants" where there was that one spoken line that only comes out of one side of my headphones?

Â Â Â Â Â that's called 'pan.' it's available in every music making software or hardware ever, as long as you are listening to it in stereo. 'pan' is how far left or right the sound is. actually most music in stereo has all the parts positioned in slightly different places, not just exactly center. occasionally for special effects it is fun to throw something all the way to one side

      or is my headphone just broken on one side? and why is that line not written in the lyrics on the lyrics page?

Â Â Â Â Â to give the impression that it is outside commentary on the song, instead of actually in the song. also it was not written in the song, it was probably something i came up with when recording the vocal

10.28.19  8:27 am   what is music?

Â Â Â Â Â a highly customizable feels enhancer. if you present a lemon, coupled with exactly the right tailor made music, the feels of the lemon can go to upwards of 50,000,000 times their original base feel. is it the music we're feeling? technically yes, but the feelings are being anchored into a tangible mental space: the lemon. the music is enhancing and shaping the feels of the lemon. with no lemon, the music will not know which feels to enhance

10.28.19  7:13 am   ok bill i need help i have no idea how basic vocal harmony works, can you help?

Â Â Â Â Â start by singing C and E notes at the same time (please middle C or above). this may be problematic because most people can only sing 1 note at a time. so the next best thing is to play those notes on a piano/keyboard. see what happens

10.28.19  1:08 am   please explain popcorn

Â Â Â Â Â the corn is filled with fluff, and when the fluff gets too hot it pops out of the corn. hot fluff. science is working very hard to figure out how to produce the hot fluff without the corn, but the problem is, even after it's popped, the corn serves a purpose: it keeps the fluff from expanding even more. without the corn, the fluff would actually keep expanding and engulf the entire universe
